info.name: JMAP
info.description: The JMAP App for Nextcloud provides [JMAP](https://jmap.io/) support for Nextcloud systems by exposing a RESTful-like API Endpoint which speaks the JMAP Protocol. Use it to sync PIM data via a JMAP-compatible client such as OpenXPort or [lttrs-cli](https://github.com/iNPUTmice/lttrs-cli) (coming soon).
